message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,300,000 is fair.  What do you think?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product provides significant value beyond that price point. How about we settle at $1,275,000?
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I really think $1,200,000 is the highest I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at this price?
